attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are reasons to feel concerned that Iraqui security and police officials do not always treat detainees according to the principles of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and the Convention Against Torture, that the prisons are excessively overcrowded and that the judicial process is often unduly delayed

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
